window.description: Analysis window size in ms, zero-padded to 4 digits (e.g. 0025 = 25 ms).

mean.description: Mean RMS loudness for the window, zero-padded to 5 digits (e.g. 08130).

crest.description: Crest factor (peak / RMS), zero-padded to 5 digits (e.g. 06500).

lufs.description: LUFS for the window, zero-padded to 5 digits (e.g. 09550).

variance.description: Short-term loudness variance, zero-padded to 5 digits (e.g. 01200).

description: DYN (prefix), window (4), mean (5), crest (5), LUFS (5), variance (5). Example: DYN002508130065000955001200 = 25 ms window, mean 08130, crest 06500, LUFS 09550, variance 01200.
